title: 1BR Unique Lake Area Traditional 1930's Apartment
posting_body: SHOWING TUESDAY 8/2/22, 7 TO 8 PM AND THURSDAY 8/4/22, 7 TO 8 PM
This bright, spacious 720 square foot three-room unit offers a flexible floor plan.
The pristine spaces features plank hardwood floors and tile.
Contemporary sconces grace the window-filled main room with new linen drapes.
Storage abounds with 1 large closet located in the Main room 15’ x 18’ and 2 closets in the Second room 25’ X 8’ with a Queen Murphy wall-bed and built-in desk for your office.
The huge eat-in kitchen features new base cabinets, a butcher block counter and slate backsplash.
There’s a gas range, dishwasher, microwave, and back door to a sunny small porch and garden.
The white tiled bath also features new tub and vanity with drawers.

There’s an on-site laundry, shared with the other 4 units in this wonderful classic building—all located only a few short blocks to lakeshore/Grand Ave shopping and entertainment and a few steps away from Trader Joes and the Lake Shore weekend Framers Market, Saturday and Sunday.
Maintained and managed by real people, not a corporate entity!
Definitely worth your time.
-Bright and sunny Oakland hill view
-Recently refinished plank hardwood floors
-New eat-in kitchen update with cabinets and tile floor
-Bath features contemporary fixtures, new Tub/shower and 3 Drawer Vanity
-Gas heat
-Laundry additional $20/month
-Great
Lakeshore location, just blocks to shops, transportation, entertainment
-Cats ok
-Shared Garden with fruit trees
-Nonsmoking unit
-Appliances Gas Range, Refrigerator, Dishwasher and Microwave
-Deposit: $2000
-Month-to-Month with 12 month commitment
Call or email for an appointment.
Paul
